item.title: London Bitcoin Devs - Bitcoin Core v0.17
item.description: On 16 August 2018, I gave a presentation to the London Bitcon Devs meetup group covering: The upcoming Bitcoin Core v0.17 release Chaincode Labs Bitcoin Optech General Q & A Slides: BitcoinCore17.pdf Video: youtube Transcript: http://diyhpl.us/wiki/transcripts/london-bitcoin-devs/jnewbery-bitcoin-core-v0.17/
